item.title: Multi-arch Docker builds with Rust
item.description: Introduction I’ve recently been playing with some Rust projects and one of the biggest struggles I had was getting a small platform agnostic Docker image that I could use to build any platform using docker buildx. The code I wrote a very small program that spits out a random number along with the current architecture to use as an sample for our Docker work. use rand::Rng; use current_platform::CURRENT_PLATFORM; fn main() { let mut rng = rand::thread_rng(); let r_num: u8 = rng.
